content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(1, 1) and position(3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1) with no fuel and full inventory of iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0) with 5 coal as fuel and full inventory of iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into any furnace.
- Check the inventory of the furnace to confirm it is not full before inserting items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to check the furnace's inventory before extracting items to ensure there are items available to extract. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
